name: DuoTris Online
summary:
DuoTris Online is a great puzzle game that use multiplayer mode to create great challenges between players in the net.
You can play it alone and try to beat the highest score, or at least to have a good place in it. Or you can try to win more battles than the other raising the "Online Win" leaderboard playing the 2 players mode.
What are you waiting for?
Challenge your friends and become the best DuoTris player!
